name: move_piezo
desc: move piezo at given position

name: hv_switch
desc: turn on (255) or off (0) the high voltage transformer

name: diode_switch
desc: turn on (255) or off (0) the diode

name: dac_switch
desc: turn on (255) or off (0) the piezo DACs

name: tec_switch
desc: turn on (255) or off (0) the TEC module

name: change_mode
desc: transition to given mode

name: reset
desc: reset

name: stop_hk
desc: stop automatic transmission of hk data

name: set_temperature
param: setpoint value (approx: 32767 = 14 deg C, 0 = 2 deg C)
desc: set the tempertaure setpoint of the TEC

name: set_integrationTime
desc: set the integration time

name: set_delay
desc: set the delay between two integrations

name: change_sysclock_freq
desc: change the frequency of sysclock

name: set_datetime
desc: synchronize date and time with the computer

name: get_counts
desc: do one integration and send back the result

name: start_hk
desc: start automatic transmission of hk data

name: set_param
param: A list of the destinations pids
a list of the parameteres key
desc: set param

name: get_param
param: A list of the destinations pids
a list of the parameteres key
desc: get param

name: echo_bld
param: the message, as a list of bytes
crc computed on the data and sec hdrbytes
desc: Repeats the message received

name: configure_rtc
param: crc computed on the data and sec hdrbytes
desc: configure the RTC on LSE, and set date and time

name: flash_read
param: address of the first byte to read
crc computed on the data and sec hdrbytes
desc: read and return a given number of bytes in the flash memory

name: flash_erase
param: crc computed on the data and sec hdrbytes
desc: erase an entire sector (2048k) of the flash memory

name: launch_application_A
param: crc computed on the data and sec hdrbytes
desc: jump to application A

name: launch_application_B
param: crc computed on the data and sec hdrbytes
desc: jump to application B

name: soft_reboot
param: crc computed on the data and sec hdrbytes
desc: reboot the payload

name: flash_write
param: address of the first bytes to write
the list of bytes to be written
crc computed on the data and sec hdrbytes
desc: write a given number of given bytes at given address in the flash memory. Security features are implemented at software level in the payload code. No risk involved (almost).

name: set_registers
param: crc computed on the data and sec hdrbytes
desc: set values of given registers

name: get_registers
param: crc computed on the data and sec hdrbytes
desc: get values of given registers

name: switch_crc
param: state of CRC check (255 active, 0 not active)
desc: turn on (255) or off (0) CRC check

name: get_version
desc: return name and version number of program

name: get_boot_report
desc: return error obtained at boot time

name: switch_cheatmode
desc: activate or deactivate cheat mode to get fake data

name: echo_pld
param: the message, as a list of bytes
desc: Repeats the message received
